expo.name: VaccineWA
expo.description: VaccineWA is a Covid-19 Vaccine Finder App for the residents of Washington State. It helps Washingtonians find a covid-19 vaccine in their zipcode. It filters throught a JSON file of all the providers in that zipcode and presents the information in a simple, intuitive UI.Users can search for providers within a zipCode in the state,view Washingon state's vaccine phases schedule,view the Vaccine Types availble at that location(if provided) find directions, email or call ahead, contact the provider and schedule an appointment.
